headline: Barclays cuts homebuilding stocks on flattening home prices, elevated incentives
summary: Barclays (LON:BARC) on Wednesday downgraded the ratings of some U.S. homebuilding stocks DR Horton Inc (NYSE:DHI), Lennar Corporation (NYSE:LEN), PulteGroup Inc (NYSE:PHM) and KB Home (NYSE:KBH) from Overweight to Equal Weight as it expects the rise in new and existing home inventory will lead to flattening home prices and persistently elevated incentives.

headline: Barclays downgrades US homebuilder stocks as risk-reward turns more balanced
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays (LON:BARC) analysts on Wednesday cut ratings on several homebuilder stocks, including DR Horton (NYSE:DHI), Lennar Corp (NYSE:LEN)., PulteGroup Inc (NYSE:PHM), and KB Home (NYSE:KBH), downgrading them from Overweight to Equal Weight.
